src:
Bekuk Arsenal, Chamberlain Sanjung Mental Baja Skuat Muda Liverpool
01 Nov 2019, 16:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pujian diberikan Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain kepada para penggawa muda Liverpool. Ia menilai tim muda The Reds memiliki mentalitas baja sehingga mereka bisa mengalahkan Arsenal.
Pada tengah pekan kemarin, Liverpool menghadapi Arsenal di babak 16 besar Carabao Cup. Mengingat The Reds melakoni jadwal yang sangat padat, Jurgen Klopp memutuskan untuk menurunkan banyak pemain muda di laga tersebut.
Partai yang digelar di Anfield itu berlangsung sengit, di mana Arsenal beberapa kali unggul lebih dahulu dari Liverpool. Namun The Reds dengan mental bajanya terus menyamakan kedudukan sehingga pertandingan menjadi 5-5 dan mereka mengalahkan sang tamu melalui adu penalti.
Chamberlain mengaku timnya bisa menang karena tim muda Liverpool memiliki mental baja. "Kami menang karena mentalitas yang dimiliki para pemain kami," ujar Chamberlain kepada Sportsmole.

Baca komentar lengkap sang gelandang di bawah ini.
text:
Defeat Arsenal, Chamberlain Honors Mental Steel Liverpool Youth Squad
Nov 1 2019, 16:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A compliment was given by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain to young Liverpool fans. He considered the Reds youth team to have a steel mentality so they could beat Arsenal.
In the middle of last week, Liverpool faced Arsenal in the last 16 of the Carabao Cup. Considering the Reds have a very tight schedule, Jurgen Klopp decided to reduce the number of young players in the match.
The party that was held at Anfield took place fiercely, where Arsenal several times ahead of Liverpool. But the Reds with their steel mentality continued to equalize so the match became 5-5 and they defeated the guest on penalties.
Chamberlain claimed his team could win because the Liverpool youth team had a mental steel. "We won because of the mentality of our players," Chamberlain told Sportsmole.

Read the midfielder's full comments below.
